body:
## I am Andrew C. Rausch,
### Medical student at Tufts University in Boston, MA

***

Now in my final year of medical school, I like using data-driven analysis to guide practice.  
Previously, I've researched subjects ranging from corn genomics, to galactic formation, to multi dimensional MRI image processing.  
At home, I love to cook --- I dare you to find a better braised short rib!  
An interesting local craft beer or a well made coffee pourover, I dig well crafted drinks. Ask me, and I can talk brewing techniques for hours!
